basics.name: Tim Jacobs
basics.label: Staff Software Engineer | Data Engineering & Architecture
basics.summary: Staff Software Engineer specializing in large-scale backend architecture, data engineering, and high-impact DevOps transformation. Proven ability to drive technical roadmaps, mentor engineers, and deliver pragmatic, quality-focused solutions that optimize value streams and enable data-driven strategy across organizations.

highlights: Scalable Data Infrastructure: Implemented medallion architecture on Snowflake-based data pipelines to ingest and process trillions of rows of cross-platform data, supporting 20+ enterprise partners.

Privacy & Governance Framework: Architected a comprehensive data deletion and anonymization system in Snowflake and Airflow to ensure legal and regulatory compliance; established flexible automated TTL (Time-To-Live) policies for sensitive PII data across large-scale distributed datasets.
Unified Metadata Architecture: Engineered hypernormalized metadata management.

Designed & delivered comprehensive test architecture for event-driven billing service processing millions of daily transactions; enabled continuous deployment across 8+ microservices-based systems with 99.9% reliability
Architected & deployed 40+ shared platform components consumed by 15+ engineering teams; reduced time-to-market for new features by 50% and improved code reuse across organization
Led technical design of CI/CD pipeline modernization (GitHub Actions + ArgoCD); improved deployment velocity by 3x, reduced mean time to recovery by 60%, and enabled 200+ deployments/week
Mentored 6 junior engineers on microservices patterns, testing strategy, and AWS cloud best practices; 3 engineers promoted during tenure

Developed scalable test automation framework for microservices in Python/Golang using AWS Lambda, S3, and SQS; automated 90% of previously manual test execution, reducing test cycle time from 6 hours to 12 minutes
Led operational data team; designed & implemented reference data re-architecture using event-driven ETL; reduced mean commit-to-deploy time from weeks to hours, enabling release velocity of 3x

work.summary: Test Automation Leadership, Platform Architecture & DevOps Transformation
highlights: Designed & led test result reporting platform from concept to production; engineered queryable database with 2M+ daily test records and automated management dashboards, eliminating 40+ hours/week of manual reporting

Spearheaded DevOps transformation initiative with cross-functional stakeholders; reduced build failure rate by 50%, improved deployment reliability by 35%, and decreased infrastructure costs by $500K+/year

Architected & contributed to containerized test framework enabling migration of 1,000+ test cases from legacy systems to modern CI-driven infrastructure; reduced test execution time by 70% and improved reproducibility

Served as product owner for distributed engineering team of 12 engineers (Bangalore); maintained 100% on-schedule feature delivery through clear technical direction, architectural decisions, and mentorship
Optimized legacy test suites through systematic refactoring & parallelization; reduced resource requirements by 6x in 2 weeks, saving ~$200K/year in infrastructure costs

work.summary: Validation Leadership & Data-Driven Operations (4 Direct Reports)
highlights: Managed team of 4 engineers validating enterprise/data center SAS/SATA SSDs across 4 Tier-1 OEM partners; maintained >$60M quarterly revenue through rigorous, on-time qualification processes

Designed & deployed qualification test status database with automated test script integration; eliminated manual reporting, enabled real-time visibility into validation progress, and reduced management reporting overhead by 30 hours/week

Led complete automation client rewrite to meet compatibility team requirements; reduced deployment schedule by 20 months, improved test execution efficiency by orders of magnitude, and unblocked product roadmap
Developed automated failure analysis debug scripts for firmware team; reduced debug overhead by 30% and accelerated time-to-resolution by 2x, enabling faster release cycles
Compiled MTTF/MTBF data on failure modes enabling program management, quality, and reliability teams to make data-driven decisions supporting product roadmaps and SLAs

Built comprehensive instrument, material, schedule & design verification database with web interface & automated work control document generation; eliminated field rework, reducing engineering overhead from 40+ hours/week to zero

work.position: Hardware Test Engineer → Failure Analysis Lead
work.summary: Failure Analysis Leadership & Product Transfer to Production
highlights: Led product transfer from development (Longmont, CO) to production (Wuxi, China) as failure analysis lead; delivered Seagate's first 7200 RPM mobile drive to production at >90% yields

interests.name: Machine Learning & Predictive Analytics
keywords: Design and validation of neural networks for sports prediction (NCAA basketball & college football outcomes)

interests.name: Wildlife Education & Risk Management
keywords: Assistant handler of alligators and venomous snakes (Reptile Gardens, Rapid City, SD)
